name: Waterproof Dog Raincoat with Hood Reflective Lightweight Rain Jacket Leash Hole for Small Medium Dogs Puppy Clothes Yellow Size M (6-11 lbs, 3-5 kg)
Waterproof Dog Rain Coat - Reflective Adjustable Pet Raincoat Jacket, Lightweight Dog Hooded Poncho Raincoats for Small to X- Large Dogs and Puppies (Pink, Medium)
short_description: LIGHTWEIGHT & WATERPROOF DOG RAINCOAT - This dog raincoat is made from 100% polyester waterproof fabric, It is lightweight and water-resistant enough to keep your puppy comfortable and dry during walking even in the worst weather conditions, and it’s very rugged and will be used for a long time.

SAFETY REFLECTIVE DOG PONCHO - This dog raincoats design with high visibility reflective strips in the middle of the belly helps to keep your pet be seen& rescued when you out for a night walking in bad weather days. When a flashlight or strong light shots, the dog coat is highly reflective, which will enable your dog to avoid being hit by a careless driver.

ADJUSTABLE & 4 SIZES AVAILABLE - This fashion dog rain jacket uses comfortable adjustable belly and chest straps to make it convenient and enjoyable to put on and tack off, and it protects the dog’s abdomen better to prevent it from anxiety in bad weather. Four different sizes—S, M, L, and XL, make sure that you purchase suitable pet raincoats for your dogs.

PRACTIEALITY FUNCTION - This dog rain coats have a professional elastic adjustment cap buckle to adjust the size of the hood to protect the dog’s head better and closely, and the design with traction rope hole can be connected to the leash and other dog accessories easily such as dog collar, dog vest.

EASY TO CLEAN & PACK RAIN SLICKER -- This lightweight pet rain coat is very easy to clean and can be folded into any shape to fit into car storage areas or day bags for trips to the park, beach, or hiking trails and camping trips.

name: Clear Transparent Dog Raincoat - Hooded Slicker Poncho with Harness Access, Adjustable Fit for Small to X-Large Dogs,S
SlowTon Dog Raincoat, Adjustable Dog Rain Jacket Clear Hooded Double Layer, Waterproof Poncho with Reflective Strip Straps and Storage Pocket for Small Medium Large Dogs Puppies(FU S)
short_description: 【Waterproof Nylon Material and Soft Inner Cotton Mesh Layer】 --- Crafted from 100% waterproof polyester fabric material to keep your pet dry even in the worst weather conditions. XXL size dog raincoat spec: back 22.6in, chest 30-35in, fit for dogs like Golden Retriever, Labrador Retriever. Please measure your dog and choose the correct size.

【Clear Hooded & Reflective Brim】 --- Newly designed with a transparent EVA hood, this dog raincoat can help shield the rain, wind and snow without blocking the sight of your pets. Extra safety is ensured by the reflective brim for high visibility at night or on dreary rainy days.

【Portable Pocket Design & Leash Hole】 --- There is a small pocket on top to have this raincoat easily folded into a bag and portable for car storage or trips. When it rains, the pocket can be a cover to protect the hole for leash hook on the back.

【Adjustable & Quick Fit Straps】 --- It applies adjustable straps on the neck and belly part for a secure and comfortable fit on most breeds of dogs. Simply adjust the to put on the raincoat for your dog.

【Various Size for All Size and Breed】 --- 7 sizes from XS to XXXL for you to choose and suitable for small, medium and large dogs range from 5 to 88 lbs.Note: Please measure your pet dog’s back length, neck girth and chest girth and refer to the size chart before purchase.

name: Dog Raincoat Reversible, Single Side Slicker Poncho Adjustable Waterproof Dog Rain Jacket with Leash Hole/Reflective Stripe Hooded Snowproof Windproof Clothes for Small to 3X-Large Dogs, S
short_description: 🐶【2 in 1 Reversible Design】Kimee reversible stylish slicker poncho can easily transform from solid color to cute pattern design (duck, colorful raindrops, camouflage forest, and romantic rain gear). Simply flip the raincoat around, and you will get your doggie a brand-new raincoat!

🏅【Reflective Strip & Adjustable Belly Strap】The edge of the dog rain coat is covered with reflective strips to ensure that your dog has high visibility in dark or rainy weather. It also comes with an adjustable belly strap to help you find a correct and comfortable fit for your dog.

⛈【Built-in Leash Hole & Elastic Fixed Leg Loop Design】The built-in leash hole on the collar allows you to leash the dog while walking in the rain easily. Dog rain jackets may be blown up on windy days. To prevent that from happening, we prepared elastic tail and leg loops to ensure the raincoat would stay steady on such turbulent days.

🌟【Size Guide】For a correct fit waterproof raincoat for dogs, it is necessary to measure your dog's body length, chest, and neck in inches, and compare to the provided size chart. If your pet's measurements fall between two sizes, we recommend ordering the larger of the two sizes.
💝【We Take Responsibility For Our Product】If there are any quality-related problems that upset you, feel free to contact us, we offer a warranty of up to 60 days.

short_description: 🌧️ 360° Weather Defense & Dry Legs Extended leg sleeves with elastic cuffs shield your dog's limbs from rain and mud (paws excluded), while fully taped seams provide full-body waterproof protection. Keeps the torso and legs dry without restricting natural movement.

🧩 Modular Design for Custom Use Detach the hood and tail cover as needed – use the hood in heavy rain or remove it for better visibility. Adjustable belly straps ensure secure fit for medium-large breeds (20-95lbs)
🔒 Hassle-Free Dressing & Fur Safety Top-mounted snag-free zipper features inner fabric guard to prevent fur catching. Enables quick one-person operation – no more struggling to dress large dogs!

⚠️ Night Safety & Durability Reflective trim decoration enhances nighttime visibility by retro-reflecting light, significantly improving safety during dark walks. Rugged polyester with reinforced leg openings withstands rough terrain.
🐕 Breed-Optimized Comfort Designed for active breeds like Border Collies and Golden Retrievers – long leg sleeves protect without tripping.

name: Adjustable Large Dog Raincoat with Strip Reflective - Waterproof Pet Rain Jacket Hoodie Poncho,for Large and Medium Dogs (Orange,M)
short_description: Superior Quality Material: Our pet raincoat is made of tear-resistant and puncture-resistant professional outdoor material with high waterproof and breathable quality, ensuring your furry friend stays dry, comfortable, and protected in any weather condition.
Perfect Fit: The elastic leg straps and adjustable belly strap provide a secure and comfortable fit for your pet, allowing them to move around freely without any discomfort or restrictions.
High Visibility Design: The reflective type on the back of our raincoat ensures your pet is visible in low-light conditions, keeping them safe during nighttime walks or bad weather.

Easy to Clean and Use: Our dog raincoat is lightweight and easy to wear, and it's also effortless to clean. Just wipe it with a towel to clean most of the stains, making it a convenient accessory for pet owners who enjoy outdoor activities with their furry friends.
Size: M (16"): Back length 15"--18", Chest circumference 21"--24", Neck circumference 13"--14".REMINDER: Please be sure to measure your dog accurately before placing an order
product_description: Introducing the Carledon Dog Raincoat, the perfect solution for medium to large dog breeds to stay dry during inclement weather. Our raincoat is made with high-quality, durable outdoor materials that are both breathable and waterproof, ensuring your furry friend stays comfortable and dry in any weather. Featuring an adjustable belly strap and elastic leg straps, our raincoat provides a secure and comfortable fit for your dog. Plus, our reflective strip hoodie ensures your dog stays visible and safe during walks in low-light conditions. Don't settle for inferior raincoats that can't stand up to the elements. 【Lightweight Reflective Design】Integrated reflective strips enhance visibility during nighttime walks, and the breathable fabric prevents overheating.

product_description: Imagine rainy walks where your furry friend stays happily dry! Our poncho-style raincoat covers large dogs with full-body coverage, letting them cover through puddles without discomfort. You’ll love how the adjustable neck and belly straps create a snug fit that stays put during active outings. Crafted from 100% waterproof polyester, this lightweight jacket features reflective safety strips and a built-in leash hole for no worry walks. The open-leg design ensures comfort of movement while keeping their core perfectly protected. Includes a handy storage pouch for on-the-go convenience. Size carefully matches your dog’s measurements – please refer to our product images for exact dimensions before ordering.
